data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.name: Method Conference
relatedRecords.description: The first annual METHOD conference will take place in Springfield, Missouri on Thursday, March 5th, 2020. Be sure to enter your email address below to get updates.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: AllTheTalks
relatedRecords.description: A virtual fundraising tech conference on all things DevOps, Development & Security. Providing a safe online platform for talks cancelled due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.
